blogPost.title: REDDIT TAKES DOWN IMMENSELY POPULAR WALLSTREETBETS *
blogPost.author: The_Real_Fly

previous.excerpt:
I’ve seen many posts (especially on wsb) over the past few days suggesting that
shorts need ALL of our retail shares to cover their positions (as interest
is/was over 100%) and so we just have to be patient, wait and hold. With the
recent influx of new investors, I just wanted to share why this is…

next.excerpt:
I keeps an eye on Canadian markets for a number of reasons, one thing that has
been interesting to watch: Canadian REITs.

While there are some caveats (many don’t have shares that trade in the US, FX
issues), they seem like a great value. And if your broker let’s you get to
international markets…

localize.title: 加拿大REITs。小众，但准备好了增长和支付红利。
localize.the_new_excerpt:
我关注加拿大市场的原因有很多，其中有一件事是
一直是有趣的观察。加拿大房地产信托基金。

虽然有一些注意事项（许多人没有在美国交易的股票，FX
问题），他们似乎是一个巨大的价值。如果你的经纪人让你得到
国际市场...
